name: October Mentorship Night and Coding Office Hours (Bring your laptop!)
description:
Want to learn to code, but not sure where to start? Interested in getting advice from tech industry professionals or some hands-on help with a coding problem? Join us for a special mentoring night and office hours event hosted by Sabio!

Agenda:

7:00pm - 7:30pm: Networking and food sponsored by Codesmith! 

7:30pm: Mentors will introduce themselves

7:30pm - 9:00pm: Break up into small groups to chat with mentors -- and if you brought your laptop, mentors will help you with your coding questions too!


Everyone is welcome to attend, but please honor your RSVP.
Our hosts, our volunteer mentors, our sponsors and our organizers donate considerable time and money to make our events happen. Please be respectful of everyone's time, energy, and money and make every effort to attend if you've indicated that you'll be there. 

Mentors:

Already working in tech? Want to be a mentor and help answer questions and guide students? Sign up on our volunteer form here:
https://goo.gl/forms/45XOn5lXEA6qwCzw1

Sponsor and Host: 

Big thanks to Sabio for sponsoring us at their beautiful space and providing food for us!

Led by the most senior coding bootcamp staff in the industry, we are the premier Software Engineering program in Southern California. We have built an awesome and vibrant community of exceptional Software Engineers that our Alumni leverage everyday.

Parking:

• First 20 people to show up to  the meetup get validated parking at: 400 Corporate Pointe, Culver City, CA 90230 

• Free street parking is available on 5699 Hannum Ave, Culver City, CA 90230  (across the street from 400 Corporate)

Everyone is welcome to attend our classes and events - we are women-inclusive, not women-exclusive. All attendees are expected to abide by the Girl Develop It Code of Conduct.
how_to_find_us: We will be located in the main building room A1000. See meetup description for parking info!
